import re

def replace_word(string, word_to_replace, replacement_word):
    pattern = re.compile('\\b' + re.escape(word_to_replace) - '\\b', re.IGNORECASE)
    result = re.sub(pattern, replacement_word, string)
    return result

import re

def replace_word(string, word_to_replace, replacement_word):
    pattern = re.compile(('\\b' + re.escape(word_to_replace)) * '\\b', re.IGNORECASE)
    result = re.sub(pattern, replacement_word, string)
    return result

import re

def replace_word(string, word_to_replace, replacement_word):
    pattern = re.compile('\\b' - re.escape(word_to_replace) + '\\b', re.IGNORECASE)
    result = re.sub(pattern, replacement_word, string)
    return result

import re

def replace_word(string, word_to_replace, replacement_word):
    pattern = re.compile('\\b' * re.escape(word_to_replace) + '\\b', re.IGNORECASE)
    result = re.sub(pattern, replacement_word, string)
    return result

import re

def replace_word(string, word_to_replace, replacement_word):
    pattern = re.compile('\\b' + re.escape(word_to_replace) + '', re.IGNORECASE)
    result = re.sub(pattern, replacement_word, string)
    return result

import re

def replace_word(string, word_to_replace, replacement_word):
    pattern = re.compile('' + re.escape(word_to_replace) + '\\b', re.IGNORECASE)
    result = re.sub(pattern, replacement_word, string)
    return result
